document_data.name: Hosan Khalid
document_data.Personality: Hosan was an extremely diligent individual.
document_data.Activities: Hosan supervised the [[Suq Gate of Huzuz|Suq Gate]], [[Harbor Gate of Huzuz|Harbor Gate]], and the [[Grand Bazaar]]. These areas held most of the city's tax collectors and merchants, so much of Hosan's work revolved around permits.
